sentence.Network_en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentence.Network_en: This shampoo smells fruity and leaves the hair beautifully silky.
sentence.Network_cn: 这款洗发水是果香型的，洗后头发如丝般顺滑。

sentence.Network_en: The beautifully made briefcase is a snip at £74.25.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个做工精美的公文包售价才74.25英镑，可谓物美价廉。

entry.def: A beautiful person is very attractive to look at.

example.ex: She was a very beautiful woman...
To me he is the most beautiful child in the world.
example.tran: 对我来说，他是世界上最美丽的孩子。

entry.def: If you describe something as beautiful, you mean that it is very attractive or pleasing.
You can describe something that someone does as beautiful when they do it very skilfully.

auth_sentence.content: Check the beautifully cosmic sax on the title track.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Check the beautifully cosmic sax on the title track.

auth_sentence.content: Written like a true romantic, and written beautifully.

auth_sentence.content: Some early Labour posters are beautifully and movingly drawn.

Sentence.sentence: It has excellent organic farms, beautifully crafted cheeses, high-quality meats.

sentences.cn: 她美丽而又光滑的皮肤

sentences.en: Her clothes were always beautifully ironed.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服总是熨得很漂亮。

sentences.en: Iceland is full of hot springs, beautifully coloured rocks, and other natural wonders.
sentences.cn: 冰岛遍布温泉、美丽的五彩岩石和其他自然奇观。
他击的那一球非常出色。

sentences.en: I remember him,as a child,playing the piano beautifully.
sentences.cn: 我记得他小时候钢琴弹得可好哩。

sentences.en: I read a beautifully written novel.
sentences.cn: 我读了一本写得十分精彩的小说。
